resources.string:
This application is made for the technical test in Experimentality hiring interview. 
 
 Main usage: 
 	 - Take pictures from an object. 
 	 - Use IBM Watson Vision Classifier API to recognize the object 
 	 - Post the object in MercadoLibre using MercadoLibre API 
 
 Tools included: 
 	 - Retrofit2.0: © Copyright 2013 Square, Inc. 
 	 - ORMLite: © Copyright 2010 to 2011 by Gray Watson 
 	 - OkHttp: © Copyright 2014 Square, Inc. 
 	 - MercadoLibre API: © Copyright 2016 MercadoLibre S.R.L 
 	 - IBM Watson API: © Copyright IBM Corporation 1994, 2017. 
 
 
 Powered by: 
 	 	 Santiago Romero (a.k.a. Bonampa312)
